local_intent: Perceive and localize the grape, move above it, set yaw to 90, approach and align within 0.005 m tolerance, and verify proximity.
assumptions: 5 cm vertical clearance is safe for moving above the grape
Yaw 90 degrees aligns with the approach from the right
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase of the global plan: visibility check with optional spiral scan, detection, safe move-above, yaw set to 90, precise ApproachAndAlign (0.005, 1200), and verification before any grasp.
